title: Ticket #5263: [EC2]  Supply useful default tags.
description: It may be a good idea to supply a default set of tags for EC2 instances. These tags (or tag with a list value) could include things like the global job ID, the pool name, or the job owner / accounting group(s). Since tags are a limited resource (10?), we should use as few as possible, and we need to make the defaults easy to turn off.
remarks:
2016-Jun-18 13:42:42 by tlmiller:
If we continue to set the 'name' tag by default, this makes sense -- we can add all of the tags in a single call to the API. However, since that call is per-instance, we need to think about being scalable by default. If we move forward with this, update the WantsNameTag submit-file flag to be and cover WantDefaultTags.
creator: tlmiller
